content: How can I use MATLAB to generate a set of 6 unique integers between 1 and 500, with each integer having an equal probability of being selected, based on the month of 6 friends' birthdays between January 1st and June 30th? The month of each birthday can be represented as an integer between 1 and 6. Is there a way to accomplish this without manually checking every possible combination? Please provide the specific MATLAB code to achieve this task.
